title: Giraffe Face
description:
A giraffe, the tallest animal on Earth, with spots and a long neck. Generally depicted in yellow or tan in full profile on all fours facing left, with distinctive brown spots and small, horn-like structures.

Samsung’s designs feature a giraffe face looking straight ahead. Facebook’s design previously featured only a giraffe face, as did Microsoft's.
apple_vendor_description: The giraffe emoji on Apple devices stands tall and elegant, showcasing its distinctive spotted pattern with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and subtle 3D shading. Its long neck reaches towards the sky, rendered with soft, rounded edges that give it a friendly, approachable feel. This majestic creature often symbolizes uniqueness, perspective, or reaching for new heights, adding a touch of the wild and wonderful to messages.
